name: Silence Of The Crabs
description:
"Silence of the Crabs" is a turn-based stealth game in which the player takes on the role of Sigma, an infiltration specialist for the rebel group called the Red Band. She has been tasked with entering a secure compound called Eden belonging to Animo Corp, the Red Band's nemesis; as they are working on a secret project stored inside Eden.

Use Sigma's special abilities to proceed within the enemy facility, and avoid detection at all cost!

Made by:

Selin Sop (Designer)

Muhsin Kaymak (Programmer)

Pablo Sarmiento (Programmer)

Elise Terranova (Artist)

Praveen Namasivayam (Sound Designer)
